MY.name: Cukup Derita Itu
MY.desc: A 2021-2024 Malaysian television drama series directed by Along Kamaludin, starring Ruhainies, Hisyam Hamid, and Chacha Maembong.

MY.name: Hati Yang Tersakiti
MY.desc: A 2020-2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Feroz Kader starring Remy Ishak, Nad Zainal and Mimi Lana. This series will start airing on Samarinda TV3 Slot on 15 October 2020 replacing Bicara Cinta.

MY.name: Maaf Tak Indah
MY.desc: A 2020-2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Zamri Zakaria starring Azlee Khairi and Azar Azmi. Adapted from the 2018 novel of the same title by Emy Roberto.

MY.name: Bukan Kahwin Paksa
MY.desc: A 2020-2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Idora Abdul Rahman, starring Kamal Adli and Hannah Delisha.

MY.name: Jaga Aku Selamanya
MY.desc: A 2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Wan Alauddin bin Wan Zainuddin with Rashidi Ishak, starring Nadiya Nisaa, Baqir Jamalullail and Puteri Rafasya.

MY.name: I Love You Mr Clown
MY.desc: A 2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Amie Maziah starring Nabil Aqil and Yuna Rahim.

MY.name: Bawah Blok
MY.desc: A 2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Shuhaimi Lua Abdullah starring Faiz Izzat, Harissa Adlynn and Amelia Christie.

MY.name: Budak Tebing 3
MY.desc: A Malaysian television drama series starring an ensemble cast led by Adam Lee and Aedy Ashraf.

MY.name: Sentuhan Najwa
MY.desc: A 2022-2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Shuhaimi Zulkefli and starring Afifah Nasir, Alif Muhaimin and Ryry Ryun.

MY.name: Adakah Engkau Menungguku
MY.desc: A 2022-2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Azmi Hatta, Starring Wanna Ali and Adam Lee.

MY.name: Do You Love Me, Captain?
MY.desc: A 2022-2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Adam Hamid starring Ali Reza and Sharifah Rose.

MY.name: Life Lila
MY.desc: A 2022-2023 Malaysian television drama series directed by Azmi Hatta, Starring Wanna Ali and Adam Lee.

PH.name: Linlang
PH.desc: A thriller drama series directed by Jojo Saguin and FM Reyes, and starring Kim Chiu. The international title is Deceit.

PH.name: Dirty Linen
PH.desc: A Philippine revenge drama television series that aired on Kapamilya Channel. Directed by Onat Diaz and Andoy Ranay, it stars Janine Gutierrez, Zanjoe Marudo, Seth Fedelin and Francine Diaz.

PH.name: The Seed of Love
PH.desc: A 2023 Philippine television drama series broadcast by GMA Network. Directed by Ricky Davao, it stars Glaiza de Castro.

PH.name: Maria Clara at Ibarra
PH.desc: The series is about a nursing student who is transported into the world of a novel after wishing to leave her country. There, she meets new people and learns about history, love, and mutual understanding.

PH.name: Unbreak My Heart
PH.desc: A 2023 Philippine romantic drama television series broadcast by GMA Network. Directed by Emmanuel Quindo Palo and Dolly Dulu, it stars Joshua Garcia, Gabbi Garcia, Richard Yap and Jodi Sta. Maria.

PH.name: Can't Buy Me Love
PH.desc: A Philippine romantic drama television series produced by ABS-CBN Studios other broadcast syndication. Directed by Mae Cruz-Alviar, Cathy Garcia-Sampana, and Ian D. Loreños.

PH.name: Senior High
PH.desc: a Philippine teen drama television series that aired on Kapamilya Channel and streamed on iWantTFC. Directed by Onat Diaz and Andoy Ranay.

TH.name: The Jungle
TH.desc: A romantic drama about a gang of men who lack empathy and play with women's feelings.

TH.name: Faceless Love
TH.desc: Faceless Love is a Thai television directed by Koo Ekkasit Trakulkasemsuk. Its cast includes Dew Jirawat Sutivanichsak, Kao Supassara Thanachart, and Luke Ishikawa Plowden.

TH.name: Devil in Law
TH.desc: The series is about Phawinee, who is angry after learning that her sister was bullied by her mother and sister-in-law.

TH.name: Moonlight Chicken
TH.desc: The series is about Jim, a diner owner who sells Hainanese chicken rice, and Wen, a drunk customer who he meets in his diner.

TH.name: Because of Love
TH.desc: A 2022-2023 TV series that is a romance-melodrama. The series is about a single mother named Tan Jing who has a son with a congenital heart disease.

TH.name: You Touched My Heart
TH.desc: The series is about two families whose business problems get involved, including the death of Anyamanee's brother.

TH.name: Return Man
TH.desc: Pribprao hires Return Man, owned by Yodyuth, to recover her cat. Impressed by his ability to not only return her cat but also enact revenge against her ex who stole it, Pribprao decides to apply to work for the company.

TH.name: The Interns
TH.desc: A group of newly graduated doctors begin their internships at Maharak Hospital. Lin hopes to impress Dr. Thida, the country's most famous brain surgeon so that she'll pick her as her protégé.

MX.name: Perdona Nuestros Pecados
MX.desc: A Mexican television series produced by Lucero Suárez. It is based on the Chilean telenovela of the same name, created by Pablo Illanes.

MX.name: Golpe De Suerte
MX.desc: A Mexican telenovela produced by Nicandro Díaz González. It is an adaptation of the Chilean telenovela Si yo fuera rico, created by Rodrigo Cuevas.

MX.name: Minas De Pasión
MX.desc: A Mexican telenovela produced by Pedro Ortiz de Pinedo. The series is based on the 2013 American telenovela La Patrona, itself an adaptation of the 1984 Venezuelan telenovela La dueña.

MX.name: Tierra De Esperanza
MX.desc: A Mexican telenovela produced by José Alberto Castro. The series is based on the 2005 American telenovela La Tormenta, created by Humberto Olivieri.

MX.name: Vencer La Culpa
MX.desc: A Mexican telenovela produced by Rosy Ocampo. The series is the fifth production of the "Vencer" franchise, and premiered on Las Estrellas on 26 June 2023.
